text:
Hi all :blush:
I'm form Russia :flag-ru: and I'm looking for a job or internship :java:

*<https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/209584977?trkInfo=searchKeywordString%3AInternship%2CsearchLocationString%3A%252C%2BMoscow%252C%2BRussian%2BFederation%2Cvertical%3Ajobs%2CpageNum%3A1%2Cposition%3A8%2CMSRPsearchId%3A4ca95667-f7b8-48d5-8055-33651d31ce0e_1474793745275&refId=4ca95667-f7b8-48d5-8055-33651d31ce0e_1474793745275&trk=jobs_jserp_job_listing_text|Technical Internship>*, Keysight Technologies, Moscow, RU. 
This is developing real world experience in a company that is a leader in the markets it serves. Qualifications: You will have a Bachelors Degree at an accredited 4-year university. <http://www5.apply2jobs.com|www5.apply2jobs.com>

*<https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/197226189?trkInfo=searchKeywordString%3AAndroid%2CsearchLocationString%3A%252C%2BMoscow%252C%2BRussian%2BFederation%2Cvertical%3Ajobs%2CpageNum%3A1%2Cposition%3A10%2CMSRPsearchId%3A8b5bfa2a-687f-468e-859b-d497dda12104_1474793888164&refId=8b5bfa2a-687f-468e-859b-d497dda12104_1474793888164&trk=jobs_jserp_job_listing_text|Technical Lead>*, IBM, MOSCOW. 
Experience in development in native (IOS, Android) and hybrid mobile applications is a plus. Experience with REST API, JAX-RS.
<@U24RMBMT9> try checking out Android United slack, it's filled with russians
<@U0548MM6B> I'm also looking for remote work

*<https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/197270375?trkInfo=searchKeywordString%3AAndroid%2CsearchLocationString%3A%252C%2BMumbai%2BArea%252C%2BIndia%2Cvertical%3Ajobs%2CpageNum%3A1%2Cposition%3A9%2CMSRPsearchId%3A1ae3f07b-20ac-4f62-8f0d-4ea8264f9fd0_1474804043731&refId=1ae3f07b-20ac-4f62-8f0d-4ea8264f9fd0_1474804043731&trk=jobs_jserp_job_listing_text|Urgent Android Developer Trainee>*, 5Apps™, Mumbai Area, India. 
We are looking for an Android Developer who possesses a passion for pushing. Work on bug fixing and improving application performance.
*<https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/210013912?trkInfo=searchKeywordString%3AAndroid%2CsearchLocationString%3A%252C%2BMumbai%2BArea%252C%2BIndia%2Cvertical%3Ajobs%2CpageNum%3A1%2Cposition%3A19%2CMSRPsearchId%3A1ae3f07b-20ac-4f62-8f0d-4ea8264f9fd0_1474804043731&refId=1ae3f07b-20ac-4f62-8f0d-4ea8264f9fd0_1474804043731&trk=jobs_jserp_job_listing_text|Android Developer - Java - eCommerce (1-5 yrs) Mumbai>*, <http://Musafir.com|Musafir.com>, Mumbai, IN. 
Desired Skills And Experience. Experience with Android Google Map APIs. 1+ years of Android App development experience. <http://hirist.com|hirist.com>

*<https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/205407035?trkInfo=searchKeywordString%3AAndroid%2BRemote%2CsearchLocationString%3A%252C%2B%2Cvertical%3Ajobs%2CpageNum%3A1%2Cposition%3A10%2CMSRPsearchId%3A84faada4-211b-4bb9-801e-f45cd2622864_1474810100434&refId=84faada4-211b-4bb9-801e-f45cd2622864_1474810100434&trk=jobs_jserp_job_listing_text|C# Developer>*, Absolute Software, Vancouver. 
Experience with developing applications for Linux, OSX and Android is a plus. 1-3 years of software development and QA experience.
*<https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/210069248?trkInfo=searchKeywordString%3AAndroid%2BRemote%2CsearchLocationString%3A%252C%2B%2Cvertical%3Ajobs%2CpageNum%3A1%2Cposition%3A17%2CMSRPsearchId%3A84faada4-211b-4bb9-801e-f45cd2622864_1474810100434&refId=84faada4-211b-4bb9-801e-f45cd2622864_1474810100434&trk=jobs_jserp_job_listing_text|Senior Android Developer>*, Michael Page, Montréal, CA. 
3+ years Experience with Android SDK, know how to deal with different versions of Android and different scree sizes. <http://michaelpage.ca|michaelpage.ca>
*<https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/210332330?trkInfo=searchKeywordString%3AAndroid%2BRemote%2CsearchLocationString%3A%252C%2B%2Cvertical%3Ajobs%2CpageNum%3A1%2Cposition%3A24%2CMSRPsearchId%3A84faada4-211b-4bb9-801e-f45cd2622864_1474810100434&refId=84faada4-211b-4bb9-801e-f45cd2622864_1474810100434&trk=jobs_jserp_job_listing_text|Service Desk Analyst>*, Mammoet, Edmonton, CA. 
...Systems, VPN client software (Citrix; Juniper), Remote... , Android, Blackberry, BES etc.) HP laptops... <http://mammoetvacancies.com|mammoetvacancies.com>

Hi all, a while ago I got started working on a social media app which allows users to upload photos within a specific location and show them in map. I’m in need of assistance/ a partner and am looking for an Android developer/shareholder who has experience and is interested in investing their time for a potentially lucrative venture. 
If you’re interested, please drop me an email at: <mailto:ivorsmorenburgaguado+pinpoint@gmail.com|ivorsmorenburgaguado+pinpoint@gmail.com> Location : Remote (EU), level mid
